meanings.sent1: The kite was flyable in the windy weather.
meanings.sent2: The airplane was designed to be flyable in all conditions.
meanings.sent3: The flyable paper airplane soared higher than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were as flyable as the birds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The flyable bird glided effortlessly through the air.

meanings.sent1: The flyable helicopter was ready for takeoff.
meanings.sent2: The flyable weather made it a perfect day for flying.
meanings.sent3: The flyable clouds seemed to beckon the adventurous pilot.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took flight with the flyable possibilities ahead.
meanings.sent5: The flyable wings of the plane shimmered in the sunlight.
